EXP4507 - Advanced Human Memory and Cogn.name: EXP4507 - Advanced Human Memory and Cognition

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: In-depth coverage of experimental research on human memory and cognition.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Some topics including human performance, obedience, ideology, aggression, and psychological well-being.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Psychological principles involved in the communicative process, with application to individuals and groups.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Consideration of physical and psychological variables in perceptual phenomena.

EXP3250 - Principles of Human Factors Ps.name: EXP3250 - Principles of Human Factors Psychology

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The study of human performance in human-machine-environment systems. Topics will include human factors psychology in the design of displays and controls, human information processing, and the effects of some environmental variables on human performance.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Theory and research on learning phenomena.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Theory and research on attention, memory, complex human learning, and problem solving.
